      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int x,
     int y,
     int mass,
     int width,
     int height,
     Manager m,
     int hp)
        Creates a new Enemy object
        Parameters:
        x - X of the enemy
        y - Y of the enemy
        mass - Mass value of the enemy(affects falling physics)
        width - Pixel width of the enemy
        height - Pixel height of the enemy
        m - Manager object
        hp - Max health of the enemy
